item.description:
So, the Red Sox didn't make it to the playoffs. I still love baseball, and I still love my GIANTS!! I'm VERY excited that they've made it AND that this next game isn't going to end at 1:00am east coast time. GAME 3 -- SF Giants @ Reds is TOMORROW at 5:30pm.  Greg, the wonderful manager at Battery Park, has agreed to put on SOUND for the game.

I'll be there in my Giants gear with my Lou Seal mascot. So, if you feel like watching some baseball, come on down!  Reds fans need not apply.  Juuuuust kidding!

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District of Boston, close to all subway lines. Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  SO PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

 

GO GIANTS!! - Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the LOU SEAL mascot! (And me in the SF Giants hat!)
item.name: NLDS Game 3 - Giants @ Reds Viewing Party
